title: Ticket #7751: JobSets attribute NextJobSetNum is confusing behavior
description:
Jaime says:
  For the job sets code introduced in #7227, there’s a new attribute in job ad 0.0, NextJobSetNum. I thought it recorded the next id to use for a new job set, similar to NextClusterNum. Instead, it records the last set id assigned. The next id to use will be one greater than it.

This ticket will fix this confusing behavior.
remarks:
2020-Jul-24 12:22:48 by tannenba:
Given this change has no visible user impact, and is in a feature disabled by default (and still undocumented), I do not think a version history blurb is wanted.

2020-Jul-29 13:38:31 by jfrey:
Yay! I approve this change.
